prelude.maintext: , so you've arrived. At your final test. You cannot believe it, a year ago you were working multiple jobs from dishwasher to line cook... and now you're here. The culmination of your work thus far. You take a deep breath and put on the headset.

dock.maintext: You are standing on a dock that outlooks a crystal-blue sea. You see a sign in your periphery.

beach.maintext: You are surrounded by sugar-white beaches. The sand is warm on your toes. You see the dock and a massive resort ahead.

lobby.maintext: You are in a massive resort lobby. It is extravagantly decorated. As you are looking through the lobby, you hear a familiar voice.

hall.maintext: You walk through the hall, storefronts line the hallway. You see an Italian restaurant and a sign pointing to the Game Floor.

restaurant.maintext: Welcome to the Italy's very own virtual restaurant

gameFloor.maintext: The game floor is bustling with excitement. A constant hum of slot machines echos throughout the open area. You spy a blackjack table being manned by a familiar face. You also see a theater in the distance
gameFloor.c1: Check out the Black Jack tables

preTheater.maintext: Please enter the magic word to watch the show

rennie.maintext: , Rennie smiles as he greets you: 'Welcome to your final virtual challenge! Your cohort has been one of the best so far, so at this point. Have fun. Are you ready to start your first challenge?'

nelly.maintext: , You see Nelly walk around from the corner, holding blueprints in hand. 'You got a second?', I need some help figuring this one out...
nelly.c1: I want to explore some more! (Go back to Lobby)

karl.maintext:
'IT'S COMING OUT FASTER THAN I CAN CATCH IT'.
'CAN YOU GIVE ME A HAND?!'
Chef Luigi Larson yells at you from the back of the restaurant.'

jay.maintext: Jay smiles a warm smile. When I'm not shredding air guitar, I moonlight as a Black Jack Dealer. Ready to find out what your next challenge is?
jay.c1: I'm not ready to play a solo, right now. Explore more

chad.maintext: , AH! Be CAREFUL! Naturally, I had to be on the nose and introduce a python into my magic act. But now it looks like I am out both a rabbit and a python. Well, would you like to start your next challenge?
chad.c1: After that? I need to step away and explore more.
